name: Don't Look Down (itch) (Don't Look Down)
description:
A little girl finds herself lost in a forest made of giant roots. She is chased by monsters and nobody's there to protect her but her little peluche...

Try out this short gothic adventure, climb the tree, fight the monsters and claim the peak! Challenging platforming, an eerie ambience, cute artstyle: this is Don't Look Down.

The game was created during the Global Game Jam 2023 with the collaboration of Make It Modena.
